data.author: Neill Blomkamp
data.quote: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.

data.author: Orison Swett Marden
data.quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.

data.author: Will Smith
data.quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

data.author: Henry J. Heinz
data.quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.

data.author: Norman Cousins
data.quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

data.author: Alanis Morissette
data.quote: It's not just the 'Grammys' that I've pulled out of. I also pulled out of the English awards as well. The reason that I wanted to pull out was because I believe very much that the music industry as a whole is mainly concerned with material success.

data.author: Martha Stewart
data.quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.

data.author: John Wooden
data.quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.

data.author: Democritus
data.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

data.author: Corita Kent
data.quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

data.author: Stephen Hawking
data.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

data.author: Felicity Kendal
data.quote: Success breeds success, and failure leads to a sort of fallow period.

data.author: Charles Kettering
data.quote: One fails forward toward success.

data.author: Jeff Rich
data.quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?

data.author: Isoroku Yamamoto
data.quote: In the first six to twelve months of a war with the United States and Great Britain I will run wild and win victory upon victory. But then, if the war continues after that, I have no expectation of success.

data.author: Bill Copeland
data.quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
data.quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.

data.author: Norman Vincent Peale
data.quote: It's always too early to quit.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
